description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9hh7g","text":"To comprehensively assess the molecular phenotypes of single cells in tissues, we devised single-nucleus methylCytosine, Chromatin accessibility and Transcriptome sequencing (snmCAT-seq) and applied it to various sample sources, like culture cells, fresh/frozen mice tissues (brain, liver, pancreases etc) and postmortem human frontal cortex tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Human Cell Atlas Method Development Community

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"e1o1l","text":"For details, please refer to the publications below:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fcbr7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dkgco","text":"Luo, C., Rivkin, A., Zhou, J., Sandoval, J.P., Kurihara, L., Lucero, J., Castanon, R., Nery, J.R., Pinto-Duarte, A., Bui, B., et al. (2018). Robust single-cell DNA methylome profiling with snmC-seq2. Nat. Commun. 9, 3824.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":221}],"data":[]},{"key":"ahg4g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b1f7j","text":"Luo, C., Liu, H., Xie, F., Armand, E.J., Siletti, K., Bakken, T., Fang, R., Doyle, W.I., Hodge, R.D., Hu, L., et al. (2019). Single nucleus multi-omics links human cortical cell regulatory genome diversity to disease risk variants. bioRxiv.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":240}],"data":[]},{"key":"e9lsv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2ulh8","text":"• For troubleshooting: feel free to leave comments or message directly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B2AE8316EB3911EB958E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://paperpile.com/b/uDyj3Z/9pjr"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B2AE834AEB3911EB958E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://paperpile.com/b/uDyj3Z/NVCW"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"belkc","text":"Reagents","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpi3e","text":"RNaseOUT™ 62249)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0dhi","text":"OptiPrep™ Density Gradient Medium (Sigma-Aldrich D1556)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4os0o","text":"Dounce tissue grinder set (2 mL) (Sigma-Aldrich D8938)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ath58","text":"Dounce tissue grinder set (7 mL) (Sigma-Aldrich D9063)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvp7u","text":"UltraPure™ BSA (50 mg/mL) (ThermoFisher AM2618)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ljjd","text":"DPBS (1X) (ThermoFisher 14190144)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvgk7","text":"GpC Methyltransferase M.CviPI (NEB M0227L) (optional)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"h7r1","text":"1% Triton II Reverse Transcriptase (ThermoFisher Scientific 18064071) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7h7ta","text":"5-methyl-dCTP (NEB N0356S)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fm74","text":"Deoxynucleotide (dNTP) Solution Set (NEB N0446S)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97jr5","text":"KAPA2G Robust HotStart PCR Kit (Roche KK5517)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21tkp","text":"10X Uracil DNA Glycosylase (UDG) (Enzymatics G5010L)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fm7hf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6q72g","text":"anti-NeuN-488 clone A60 (Millipore MAB377)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fncrh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9h0vj","text":"DNA oligos (HPLC purified, synthesized by IDT). ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"j6oh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7q01","text":"In the original snmCAT-seq protocol (ChongyuanLuo, et al. BioRxiv 2019, https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2019.12.11.873398v1), ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":57,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":59}],"data":{}},{"key":"bfnn2","text":"RT primers and TSO oligos were synthesized with a 5’-C3 Spacer. However, in recent experiments, we found a 5’-biotin spacer is necessary to prevent the concatenation of oligo molecules. We speculate the reduced efficiency for 5’-C3 Spacer in preventing oligo concatenation is due to certain composition changes in commercial enzymes used in the protocol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qne5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"736r5","text":"dT30VN_5: /5Biosg/AAGCAGUGGUAUCAACGCAGAGUACUTTTTTUTTTTTUTTTTTUTTTTTUTTTTTVN","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42q1s","text":"N6_3: /5Biosg/AAGCAGUGGUAUCAACGCAGAGUACNNNNNN","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3judm","text":"TSO_4: /5Biosg/AAGCAGUGGUAUCAACGCAGAGUGAAUrGrGrG","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b07uf","text":"ISPCR23_3: /5SpC3/AAGCAGUGGUAUCAACGCAGAGU","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7elsp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kfs9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"03B4D263EB3811EB958E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2019.12.11.873398v1"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1v8rp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94rau","text":"This protocol is based on the original protocol named as snmC2T-seq from the BioRxiv paper (ChongyuanLuo, et al. BioRxiv 2019)  https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2019.12.11.873398v1 and SMART-seq3 (Hagemann-Jensen, et al.Nat Biotechnol 2020, https://www.protocols.io/view/smart-seq3-protocol-bcq4ivyw. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":112,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":221,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":128,"length":59},{"key":1,"offset":248,"length":58}],"data":{}},{"key":"sdka","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24she","text":"Reagents and oligo sequence can be found in Materials part.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebkgm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"39C72159EB2411EB958E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2019.12.11.873398v1"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"6783DDE6EB3811EB958E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/smart-seq3-protocol-bcq4ivyw"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"amdnd","text":"Sample preparation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gk2p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ka9a","text":"We typically grind tissue samples with liquid nitrogen ahead of time and stored at -80°C.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fg0q2","text":"For smaller mouse tissues, we usually snap freeze the fresh dissected samples and store at -80°C.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lh4h","text":"For culture cells, we typically pellet either suspension cells or dissociated adherent cells, aspirate supernatant then store at -80°C.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8be9q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ean1m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"acpl7","text":"In recent experiments, we found the RNA integrity from frozen human tissues may various. DO RIN analysis in bulk tissue before starting the experiments will be helpful to know the sample quality.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4anqh","text":"Prepare the stock solutions for nuclei isolation, stored at   :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dn596","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qibs","text":"10X Diluent buffer : Tris-Cl pH 8.0 (120 mM), KCl (150 mM), MgCl2(30 mM)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qeun","text":"NIB: Tris-Cl pH 8.0 (10 mM), KCl (25 mM), MgCl2 (5 mM), Sucrose (250 mM)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A5F67650EB3C11EBAF6B87F6376D8576","id":"44500","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2na22","text":"Prepare the following solutions freshly before each experiment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3g0rb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3boc5","text":"NIB_plus  : NIB + DTT (1 mM) + Proteinase inhibitor (0.5X) + SUPERase• In ( 1:1000 dilution) + RNaseOUT ( 1:1000 dilution)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"61j36","text":"NIBT  : NIB_plus + 0.1% Triton X-100","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bhdql","text":"50% Iodixanol  : 5 vol. Optiprep (60% Iodixanol) + 1 vol. Dilutent","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3tul3","text":"25% Iodixanol  : 1 vol. 50% Iodixanol + 1 vol. NIB","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"cjfee","text":"DPBS + RNase inhibitor   : DPBS + SUPERase• In ( 1:1000 dilution) + RNaseOUT ( 1:1000 dilution)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"704ECE8CEB2B11EB958E0A58A9FEAC02","id":"44501","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"704ECF06EB2B11EB958E0A58A9FEAC02","id":"44502","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"704ECF7BEB2B11EB958E0A58A9FEAC02","id":"44503","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"704ED072EB2B11EB958E0A58A9FEAC02","id":"44504","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"704ED10DEB2B11EB958E0A58A9FEAC02","id":"44505","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fs9f","text":"Pre-chilling steps:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7kgeh","text":"Plunge the Dounce and Pestles on ice (in a 50ml tube to avoid contamination from ice).  Transfer 3ml of NIBT buffer to the Dounce in ice and let them chill for 10 min.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"409nq","text":"Pre-chill 2 ml and 5 ml low retention microcentrifuge tube  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"99bdv","text":"Cooling down the swing bucket rotor for centrifuging  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D6942410EB3C11EBAF6B87F6376D8576","id":"44506","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3D61B1B7EB2B11EB958E0A58A9FEAC02","id":"44507","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b0ko3","text":"Transfer tissue sample or pre-ground tissue powder into the Dounce containing 3 ml of NIBT.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jfoc","text":"Gently do douncing with a loose pestle (A) 40 times and then with a tight pestle (B) 40 times without introducing bubbles.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1blr0","text":"Mix the suspension with 2 ml of 50% Iodixanol by pipetting in 5ml ice-cold microcentrifuge tube.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ji86","text":"Slowly pipette 1ml of cell mixture onto 500 µl 25% Iodixanol cushion, 5 tubes in total.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m406","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000 g for 20 min at 4°C using a swing rotor.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2uqlk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8ojgh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6q6r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"170ag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"54g6c","text":"Before adding cell mixture, we usually aliquot the 500 µl 25% Iodixanol cushion into 2 ml low retention microcentrifuge tubes and centrifuge at 10,000 g for 5 min to sharp the liquid interface. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"egkle","text":"Depending on specific experiment, proceed either Section A or B or C or A+B or C+A or C+A+B","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"etmar","text":"Remove supernatant. Re-suspend the pellet in 1 ml of ice-cold DPBS + RNase Inhibitors.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdqf0","text":"Add Hoechest 33342, then incubate on ice for 5 min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejd0h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c94dr","text":"Remove supernatant. Resuspend the pellet in 900 µl of DPBS + RNase inhibitors and 100 µl UltraPure BSA (50 mg/ml).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ee8a1","text":"Add specific amount of nucleus antibodies and incubate on ice for 20 min. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6sr0j","text":"(For mouse/human neurons, 1 µl AlexaFluor 488 conjugated anti-NeuN clone A60 is used)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88s67","text":"Before do NOMe treatment, it's better to count the nuclei number either using hemocytometer or automated cell counter.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46a22","text":"Transfer less than 1 million nuclei per reaction to a new tube, centrifuge at 1000 x g for 10 min at 4°C to spin down the nuclei.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fs44","text":"Remove supernatant and resuspend in 50 µL DPBS. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mk4t","text":"Then make the 1st cycle NOMe reaction:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd169","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jhho","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8nrde","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5efrd","text":" Incubate at 37°C for 8 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2nvi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dng8b","text":"4. 2nd cycle NOMe reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hsa4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m33k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4fk3h","text":" Incubate at 37°C for 8 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nisi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjbn3","text":"5. Stop the reaction in 1ml ice-cold DPBS and centrifuge at 1000 x g for 10min at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["235",100],"data":[["GpC Methyltransferase mix (per Rxn)","ul vol."],["Nuclei mix","50"],["GpC Methyltransferase Buffer (10X) ","15"],["S-adenosylmethionine (SAM 32mM)","0.15"],["GpC MTase","15"],["H2O","70"]],"guid":"82F26D30EB3211EBAF6B87F6376D8576","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["GpC Methyltransferase mix (per Rxn)","ul vol."],["Nuclei mix","50"],["GpC Methyltransferase Buffer (10X) ","15"],["S-adenosylmethionine (SAM 32mM)","0.15"],["GpC MTase","15"],["H2O","70"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["237","101"],"data":[["GpC Methyltransferase mix (per Rxn)","ul vol."],["1st GpC treated nuclei mixture","150"],["GpC Methyltransferase Buffer (10X) ","15"],["S-adenosylmethionine (SAM 32mM)","0.15"],["GpC MTase","15"],["H2O","120"]],"guid":"AA0C2170EB4311EB981C8B0CC9055D73","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["GpC Methyltransferase mix (per Rxn)","ul vol."],["1st GpC treated nuclei mixture","150"],["GpC Methyltransferase Buffer (10X) ","15"],["S-adenosylmethionine (SAM 32mM)","0.15"],["GpC MTase","15"],["H2O","120"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhvse","text":"Centrifuge at 1000 x g for 10 min at  4°C.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmceh","text":"Remove supernatant. Resuspend the pellet in 1ml DPBS + RNase inhibitors.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bu382","text":"Filter with 40 um Cell strainer","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67o7j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajde","text":"Ready to run sorting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5om26","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmic8","text":"Prepare mCT master mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fm5ms","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14pi4","text":"
